title: Meditation: Meeting Anger with Awareness (2020-06-10)
itunes:title: Meditation: Meeting Anger with Awareness (2020-06-10)
description: Meditation: Meeting Anger with Awareness (2020-06-10) - When anger is held in mindfulness, it can energize us to respond wisely to challenging situations. This meditation guides us in meeting personal or societal anger with RAIN - recognize, allow, investigate and nurture. [NOTE: this meditation was given at the end of Tara’s "Anger and Transformation" talk on 2020-06-10.]
